channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Remote Desktop Connection Manager 2.7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Remote Desktop Connection Manager 2.7

item.title: CVE-2020-0765|2024-08-04T06:11:05.606Z -- microsoft -- remote%20desktop%20connection%20manager%202.7
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the Remote Desktop Connection Manager (RDCMan) application when it improperly parses XML input containing a reference to an external entity, aka 'Remote Desktop Connection Manager Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.
